title: Power Tariff Reform Draft: Near-term Impacts & RPO Alignment
summary: Draft tariff rationalization with stronger Renewable Purchase Obligations (RPO) introduces near-term compliance uncertainty for state DISCOMs and industrial users while accelerating renewable portfolios.
risks: Short-term tariff volatility for MSMEs in select states
Narrative risk if IAMC appears to oppose transition
Operational retooling for captive/embedded generation users
opportunities: Position IAMC as a neutral standards partner on energy affordability
Engage consumer advocacy on predictable billing windows
Amplify equitable transition framing for vulnerable workers
recommendations: Convene roundtable with consumer groups & energy lawyers (48 hours)
Collect MSME case studies (7 days) to inform position
